thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie | 2 of 25
thread.title: Pauline

author: Pauline
title: Pauline
text: V sorry I changed to this company on the promise if cheaper electric. Saw no difference and actually believe I'm paying more. Also previous provider allowed to make payments through post office for 6 weeks. Energia is a one payment only all in a lump sum. Promised a payforward plan but this is only for if you miss a payment. I have saved nothing and will be changing back after my year.
